title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 6 Reaction: Bills-Chiefs, Cardinals-Seahawks, Jets-Packers, 49ers-Falcons
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 6 Reaction: Bills-Chiefs, Cardinals-Seahawks, Jets-Packers, 49ers-Falcons
description:
Richard breaks down his thoughts and opinions on the NFL's Week 6 afternoon slate. He discusses Josh Allen leading the Buffalo Bills to an electric road victory over Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs, the Seattle Seahawks and Pete Carroll taking care of Kyler Murray's disappointing Arizona Cardinals, the Robert Saleh-led New York Jets upsetting Aaron Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers' depleted receiving core on the road (capped with Sauce Gardner celebrating by strutting around the field with a cheesehead on), and what the road ahead looks like for the San Francisco 49ers as Jimmy Garoppolo threw two picks in a shocking loss to the Atlanta Falcons. #volume #herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
